entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
